Session 14

November 26, 2024

On this page

In-class work session

We will spend the class revising and polishing our websites for the final review.

I want to meet personally with everyone for at least 5 minutes to see your latest entries and the sites as a whole.

Next class

Next week is your final critique. We will have two guests:

Victor Guan and Megan Pai.

Everyone will have 9 minutes for the entire presentation and feedback. As a reminder, here are the requirements for the project as a whole. What and how you show your project is up to you, but you will be showing the website only and not slide presentations.
